website_summaries.verdict: Made of metal. Creates a clean cut-off line for desired results.
pros: Creates tension within seconds and secure straps in minutes
Customers rave about this product's ability to secure small packages as well as pallets
We love that it can also bundle up wood, aiding in organization and storage
cons: While this tensioner works great for small products, it may not be the best choice for securing warehouse packages

customer_reviews.title: Solid budget price strapping tensioner
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to use strapping to firmly secure several large boxes with heavy contents for storage and shipping. The 9milelake Heavy Duty Tensioner & Cutter was just what I needed. It's reasonable price and solid construction was a big plus and it worked well for my purposes. I don't know how it would hold up on a warehouse dock doing hundreds of packages a week. But for a single user with basic needs for strapping it's a winner at the right price.
customer_reviews.author: APC Reviews

customer_reviews.title: For the money, quality is better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: I expect to this strapping tool, (meant for plastic, (including what I use, the Heaviest duty plastic strapping), I believe it will last a long time, tightens as it supposed to, strong spring to grip the strapping, no fumbling around, sharp cuts... everything it's supposed to be and do, ..it does well! Serious Value added! Nice tool, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Was Here

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 days of use!
customer_reviews.text: This should NOT be described as heavy duty! We used it for 3 days to band lifts of lumber until it broke... Look elsewhere for a better made tensioner.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Should have gotten a 1" tool instead of 3/4"
customer_reviews.text: The tool tensions fine. I should have gotten a 1 inch tool. I bought to re-bundle excess lumber on the job site. However when I use the old straps it won't cut all the way through because it's only 3/4". Works fine for 1/2" or 3/4 strap. I recommend getting a bigger tension tool unless you strictly work with 3/4" or smaller straps.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great tool at great price
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I thought I would have to spend a lot of money to get something for strapping. Nice and inexpensive tool for the job. I have used this a few hundred times now. My stuff is light duty so don’t need the expensive stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: We got this tool as a replacement from an older one that broke after about 5 years of use. It seemed good, but now just 3.5 months after buying, the ratchet broke off on it. We do use it every day, about twice a day, but that shouldn't have been enough to break it that quick. Poor Quality item. Get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Celtic3

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what people are talking about when they say it is built cheap. My brother works at a place that uses these every day to band product to pallets. He says it is at least as well built as what they use.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Other equipment required
customer_reviews.text: This is a great band tensioner and cutter but buyers should know other equipment is needed aside from the strapping. All told for my purposes the whole set up would have been not worth the expense. Item returned successfully and without issue.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Solid equipment
customer_reviews.text: solid, works well, easy to use by a single person to strap a box.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip T

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and tough
customer_reviews.text: Great handy product. Makes it very easy to strap pallets
customer_reviews.author: D.O.Gee

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two tensioners 6/9/17. As of today, 10/22/18 one of these did not hold up. One of them broke. These should have lasted 10 years. It says heavy duty. The only thing that is heavy is the weight. To much weight for the gals in our shipping department.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, at the lowest price I could find.
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to same exact other models. Works perfectly for bundling wood to sell.
customer_reviews.author: Take my hand not my life

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, heavy works great
customer_reviews.text: Do you know how to use a banding tool? Then this thing is great. Heavy duty, works awesome. Bought it for moving, now I use it for storage too. Keeping lumber tight in the garage. Definitely sturdy enough for the jobsite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: First two I bought broke after 2 weeks, replacement 2 still going after a month
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Strapping Tool
customer_reviews.text: Tool work great. Can be used on different types of strapping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poly strapping tensioner and cutter
customer_reviews.text: Very good, easy to use. Excellent buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Buckner

customer_reviews.title: lasted exactly one year
customer_reviews.text: update: low quality tensioner. lasted one year. it was nice to use while it worked, but unfortunately the components inside were of low quality.
customer_reviews.author: ILE

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a strap tensioner, and this one was far more affordable than the options out there. The cutter doesn't seem to cut through woven strap well, but i believe it's designed for plastic anyway. No problems!
customer_reviews.author: K. Forti

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy duty product.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty tensioner and easy to use, just can't get the cutter to work, but heavy scissors work fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Broke after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: I have had a similar one (orange) for 9 years no issues. I used this one a few times and the damn C-Clip broke off the side.
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah Nauss

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very good to use , exactly as advertised .. Highly recommanded
customer_reviews.author: Mofied Gerges

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.  Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Great tensioner. But the description said a crimping tool was included, and it was not. Happy with the tool, but the description is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a couple bands but fell apart about ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a couple bands but fell apart about an hour after I gave it too my guys to use.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Vdg

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality. Wouldn't cut the tape after making it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Poor Quality. Wouldn't cut the tape after making it tight. Had to return the product so be careful before you buy this tensioner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutter doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The strapping part is straight forward but the cutter doesn't work, just shreds band.
customer_reviews.author: RetiredGeek

customer_reviews.title: While it worked fine and seemed like it might otherwise be a good ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a crack in the 'bottom' base. While it worked fine and seemed like it might otherwise be a good product, I cannot give a higher rating if quality control is poor enough to sell broken merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: John K

product_meta.title: 9milelake Heavy Duty Tensioner & Cutter for Polyproplyn and Polyester and Cord Strapping , Strap Size: 3/8"- 3/4"
product_meta.description: This tensioner and cutter is used for 3/8 in. to 3/4 in. poly strapping. Dimensions L x W x H (in.): 11 x 6 x 3. Manual tool Tensioner.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty tensioner & cutter for polyproplyn and polyester and cord strapping for use on round or
For polyproplyn and polyester and cord strapping for use on round or flat surfaces
Heavy Duty Poly Tensioner and Cutter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars95 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
